nodes.name: Why Learn AI with AI-Club?
nodes.description: Given you understand the basics of AI's history and applications, let's now dive into how you would typically learn about AI at MSOE given you don't join MAIC.

nodes.name: What is the Learning Tree?
nodes.description: The learning tree is a visual representation of the world of AI, built by pulling from reliable sources students before you have identified as useful and structure in an easy-to-visualize way.

nodes.name: What is AI?
nodes.description: Let's get some contextual info on AI and how it's used in the real world!

nodes.name: What is Programming?
nodes.description: Before getting to AI development, let's start with the basics of programming. We'll also dive into how learning about programming works at college!

nodes.name: What is a Neural Network?
nodes.description: Before diving into how AI learns, let's get a general understanding of what a neural network is.

nodes.name: How Do Neural Networks Learn?
nodes.description: AI is all about learning, but how do models interpret data and actually learn from it?

nodes.name: What is 'Backpropagation'?
nodes.description: Given our model understands what's right and wrong, how does it improve itself over time?

nodes.name: Intro to Generative AI
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Intro to Natural Language Processing (NLP)
nodes.description: Learn the basics of how computers can process and understand natural language, a foundational skill for all natural language processing tasks.

nodes.name: Text Preprocessing
nodes.description: Discover key techniques like Text Cleaning, Tokenization, and Stop Word Removal to prepare text for analysis by machine learning models.

nodes.name: Bag of Words
nodes.description: Learn the concept of Bag of Words in a simple, high-level, way and then dive into learning how to implement Bag of Words in Python.

nodes.name: Embeddings
nodes.description: Learn the concepts of Vector Stores and Embeddings

nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Global Protect
nodes.description: If you need to use ROSIE while off-campus, you will need to install Global Protect!

nodes.name: Advanced Slurm Usage
nodes.description: There are often cases where you need to know how to use Slurm (Rosie's job scheduling software). This article details some basic and more advanced use cases.

nodes.name: Running VSCode Jupyter Notebooks on Rosie
nodes.description: This article is for you if you find that VSCode is a better tool than Rosie's dashboard for running Jupyter notebooks.

nodes.name: Connecting to Rosie in VSCode via SSH
nodes.description: This article walks through the process of connecting VSCode to Rosie via SSH, and explains why you might want to do so in the first place.

nodes.name: ROSIE Pt1: Getting Access
nodes.description: Let's get you access to that fancy supercomputer in Diercks Hall, no matter your major/year!

nodes.name: ROSIE Pt2: First Login
nodes.description: Now you have an email from ROSIE, let's get you logged in for the first time!

nodes.name: ROSIE Pt3: Using ROSIE Web Portal
nodes.description: Now that you have access to ROSIE with your own password, you can start using the online ROSIE interface!

nodes.name: Using the Rosie FastAPI Template
nodes.description: Do you want to build a quick, scaleable application on Rosie, but don't know how to do it? This article details how to setup the Rosie FastAPI Template!

nodes.name: ROSIE Pt4: Starting Your First ROSIE Job
nodes.description: Now that you have access to ROSIE with your own password, you can start using the online ROSIE interface!

nodes.name: ROSIE Pt5: Using the ROSIE Terminal
nodes.description: Now that you have access to ROSIE with your own password, you can start using the online ROSIE interface!

nodes.name: All Machine Learning Models Explained
nodes.description: Introduction to supervised machine learning

nodes.name: Learning How Machines Learn
nodes.description: How AI 'learns

nodes.name: Picking Which Model to Use
nodes.description: We have so many models, when should you use each one?

nodes.name: Linear Regression using SKlearn
nodes.description: Linear Regression using SKlearn

nodes.name: Using Sklearn to Use Solutions Already Found
nodes.description: Don't remake the wheel! Let's pull from the wider AI community and use the models which have been proven to solve problems!

nodes.name: Introduction to Neural Networks
nodes.description: Let's recap Neural Networks in the scope of Supervised Learning

nodes.name: Creating Your Own Neural Network
nodes.description: Let's recap Neural Networks in the scope of Supervised Learning

nodes.name: Series-Based Data
nodes.description: Something to know before getting to advanced AI topics is series-based data. This is an incredibly important concept that many concepts rely on.

nodes.name: Difference Between Supervised and Unsupervised Learning
nodes.description: In machine learning (ML), there are typically two broad categories of AI models that people typically think of: supervised and unsupervised learning.

nodes.name: Intro to Time Series Analysis
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: ARIMA
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Seasonal Decomposition
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Time Series Forecasting
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Anomaly Detection
nodes.description: COMING SOON

nodes.name: Unsupervised Clustering
nodes.description: With unsupervised learning, a common algorithm is "clustering" data points together based on their similarities. This article will explain the concept of unsupervised clustering.

nodes.name: Intro to Computer Vision
nodes.description: “Learn the basics of how computers can process and understand images, a foundational skill for all computer vision tasks.”

nodes.name: Image Preprocessing
nodes.description: “Discover key techniques like resizing, normalization, and augmentation to prepare images for analysis by machine learning models.”

nodes.name: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)
nodes.description: “Understand the structure and functionality of CNNs, the model architecture used in most modern computer vision tasks.”

nodes.name: Image Classification
nodes.description: “Learn how models are trained to classify images into categories, one of the most common applications of computer vision.”

nodes.name: Segmentation
nodes.description: “Explore how machines can identify the exact boundaries of objects within an image, making segmentation key for precision tasks.”

nodes.name: Object Detection
nodes.description: Dive into the methods for identifying and locating objects within images, a crucial skill for real-time applications like autonomous driving.

nodes.name: Vision Transformer
nodes.description: Explore the cutting-edge transformer architecture that is quickly becoming a leading method for tasks like image classification.

nodes.name: VSC Pt1: How to Use Visual Studio Code
nodes.description: A starting point for learning about how to use VSCode for machine learning on your local machine.

nodes.name: VSC Pt2: Installing Languages / Extensions in VSCode
nodes.description: A starting point for learning about how to use VSCode for machine learning on your local machine.

nodes.name: VSC Pt3: Using VSCode's Terminal
nodes.description: A starting point for learning about how to use VSCode for machine learning on your local machine.

nodes.name: VSC Pt4: Using an Environment in VSCode
nodes.description: A starting point for learning about how to use VSCode for machine learning on your local machine.

nodes.name: VSC Pt5: Using VSCode's Version Control
nodes.description: A starting point for learning about how to use VSCode for machine learning on your local machine.
